item.title: Reply to the Comment on "Magnetic moments in the Poynting theorem, Maxwell equations, Dirac equation, and QED"
item.description: arXiv:2509.25403v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This reply addresses concerns expressed in a comment (arXiv:2508.16689v1) on arXiv:submit/6841332 [physics.gen-ph] 29 Sep 2025 the paper given in the title (arXiv:2501.02022v2), hereafter referred to as the paper.
item.dc:creator: Peter J Mohr
